title: Endless.Legend.Shifters.PROPER-CODEX
description:
C O D E X
P R E S E N T S

Endless Legend Shifters PROPER (c) AMPLITUDE Studios

Release Date :  04/2016              Protection : Steam
Discs        :  1                    Genre      : Indie

Create your own Legend Another sunrise, another day of  toil.  Food
must be grown, industries built, science and  magic  advanced,  and
wealth collected. Urgency drives these simple efforts, however, for
your planet holds  a history  of unexplained  apocalypse,  and  the
winter you just survived was the worst on record. A fact  that  has
also been true for the previous five.

For more info go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/289130/

- Extract
- Burn or mount the .iso
- Run setup.exe and install
- Copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
- Play

PROPER Notes: The RLD release isn't working properly. In-game
save/load, exit to main menu etc are (still) broken
because of a bad crack. They didn't fix that in the
-BAT Hofix update either: http://imgur.com/U2fDPgL

This PROPER release already contains the 1.4.2 Hotfix Update and
includes all previously released extensions and addons.

General Notes:
- Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from
trying to go online ..
- If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
to run this game with admin privileges instead
